question: the sum of the squares of three numbers is 41 , while the sum of their products taken two at a time is 20 . their sum is :
a batsman makes a score of 83 runs in the 17 th inning and thus increases his averages by 3 . find his average after 17 th inning ?
what is the least common multiple of 8,12 , 32,14

each day a man meets his wife at the train station after work , and then she drives him home . she always arrives exactly on time to pick him up . one day he catches an earlier train and arrives at the station an hour early . he immediately begins walking home along the same route the wife drives . eventually his wife sees him on her way to the station and drives him the rest of the way home . when they arrive home the man notices that they arrived 12 minutes earlier than usual . how much time did the man spend walking ?

balls of equal size are arranged in rows to form an equilateral triangle . the top most row consists of one ball , the 2 nd row of two balls and so on . if 789 balls are added , then all the balls can be arranged in the shape of square and each of the sides of the square contain 8 balls less than the each side of the triangle did . how many balls made up the triangle ?

at a certain company , each employee has a salary grade s that is at least 1 and at most 5 . each employee receives an hourly wage p , in dollars , determined by the formula p = 10.50 + 0.25 ( s – 1 ) . an employee with a salary grade of 5 receives how many more dollars per hour than an employee with a salary grade of 1 ?
if 5 % more is gained by selling an article for rs . 350 than by selling it for rs . 340 , the cost of the article is :
in a group of 800 people , 2 / 5 play at least one instrument , 96 play two or more . what is the probability that one student play exactly one instrument ?
a , b , c subscribe rs . 50,000 for a business . if a subscribes rs . 4000 more than b and b rs . 5000 more than c , out of a total profit of rs . 35,000 , what will be the amount a receives ?
in what time will a train 175 m long cross an electric pole , it its speed be 144 km / hr ?

a man bought 10 crates of mangoes for $ 40 total . if he lost 2 of the crates , at what price would he have to sell each of the remaining crates in order to earn a total profit of 20 percent of the total cost ?
abcd is a square . e and f are the midpoints of sides cd and bc , respectively . what is the ratio of the shaded region area to the unshaded region ?
find the average increase rate , if increase in the population in the first year is 30 % and that in the second year is 40 % .
the sum of even numbers between 1 and 31 is :

today joelle opened an interest - bearing savings account and deposited $ 5,000 . if the annual interest rate is 5 percent compounded interest , and she neither deposits nor withdraws money for exactly 2 years , how much money will she have in the account ?
what is the perimeter of a square with area 9 p ^ 2 / 64 ?
what profit percent is made by selling an article at a certain price , if by selling at 2 / 3 rd of that price , there would be a loss of 14 % ?
the average of first 12 natural numbers is ?

every student in a room is either a junior or a senior . there is at least one junior and at least one senior in the room . if 4 / 5 of the juniors is equal to 1 / 2 of the seniors , what fraction of the students in the room are juniors ?
what will be the ratio between the area of a rectangle and the area of a triangle with one of the sides of rectangle as base and a vertex on the opposite side of rectangle .

a certain company reported that the revenue on sales increased 50 % from 2000 to 2003 , and increased 80 % from 2000 to 2005 . what was the approximate percent increase in revenue for this store from 2003 to 2005 ?
what is the smallest positive integer k such that the product of 61347 x k is a perfect square ?
compound interest of rs . 2000 at 10 % per annum for 1 1 / 2 years will be ( interest compounded half yearly ) .
a man ' s regular pay is $ 3 per hour up to 40 hours . overtime is twice the payment for regular time . if he was paid $ 198 , how many hours overtime did he work ?
if jake loses 5 pounds , he will weigh thrice as much as his sister . together they now weigh 285 pounds . what is jake ' s present weight , in pounds ?
the average runs of a cricket player of 8 innings was 24 . how many runs must he make in his next innings so as to increase his average of runs by 8 ?
if x * y = xy – 2 ( x + y ) for all integers x and y , then 2 * ( – 3 ) =
10 binders can bind 1400 books in 21 days . how many binders will be required to bind 1800 books in 20 days ?

two bullet trains of equal lengths take 10 seconds and 20 seconds respectively to cross a telegraph post . if the length of each bullet train be 120 metres , in what time ( in seconds ) will they cross each other travelling in opposite direction ?

a math teacher has 25 cards , each of which is in the shape of a geometric figure . half of the cards are rectangles , and a third of the cards are rhombuses . if 8 cards are squares , what is the maximum possible number of cards that re circles .
if ( a + b ) = 4 , ( b + c ) = 7 and ( c + d ) = 5 , what is the value of ( a + d ) ?

tom reads at an average rate of 30 pages per hour , while jan reads at an average rate of 39 pages per hour . if tom starts reading a novel at 4 : 30 , and jan begins reading an identical copy of the same book at 5 : 06 , at what time will they be reading the same page ?

a certain car traveled twice as many miles from town a to town b as it did from town b to town c . from town a to town b , the car averaged 8 miles per gallon , and from town b to town c , the car averaged 18 miles per gallon . what is the average miles per gallon that the car achieved on its trip from town a through town b to town c ?
the total of 334 of 20 paise and 25 paise make a sum of rs . 71 . the no of 20 paise coins is

a certain company has records stored with a record storage firm in 15 - inch by 12 - inch by 10 - inch boxes . the boxes occupy 1.08 million cubic inches of space . if the company pays $ 0.5 per box per month for the record storage , what is the total amount that the company pays each month for record storage ?
there are 680 students in a school . the ratio of boys and girls in this school is 3 : 5 . find the total of girls & boys are there in this school ?
the number of years of service of the 8 employees in a production department are 15 , 10 , 9 , 17 , 6 , 3 , 14 and 16 . what is the range in the number of years of service of the 8 employees ?

jane and thomas are among the 7 people from which a committee of 3 people is to be selected . how many different possible committees of 3 people can be selected from these 7 people if at least one of either jane or thomas is to be selected ?
find large number from below question the difference of two numbers is 1200 . on dividing the larger number by the smaller , we get 5 as quotient and the 4 as remainder

in 1998 the profits of company n were 10 percent of revenues . in 1999 , the revenues of company n fell by 20 percent , but profits were 10 percent of revenues . the profits in 1999 were what percent of the profits in 1998 ?
a train 280 m long is running at a speed of 54 km / hr . in what time will it pass a bridge 200 m long ?
if a coin has an equal probability of landing heads up or tails up each time it is flipped , what is the probability that the coin will land heads up exactly once in 3 consecutive flips ?
the average of 5 numbers is 6.8 . if one of the numbers is multiplied by a factor of 3 , the average of the numbers increases to 12.8 . what number is multiplied by 3 ?

two trains 200 m and 180 m long are running on parallel rails at the rate of 40 kmph and 45 kmph respectively . in how much time will they cross each other , if they are running in the same direction ?

a basket of 1430 apples is divided equally among a group of apple lovers . if 45 people join the group , each apple lover would receive 9 apples less . how many apples f did each person get before 45 people joined the feast ?
if the remainder is 15 when the integer n is divided by 28 , what is the remainder when 2 n is divided by 14 ?
in what ratio must rice of rs . 25 per kg be mixed with rice of rs . 12 per kg so that cost of mixture is rs . 20 per kg ?
